pageTitle: Ferme Noël d'Antan | Frequently asked questions
title: Frequently asked questions
subtitle: Here are the most frequently asked questions about our Christmas tree farm. For more information, please contact us at <phoneLink href="tel:$t(common:contact.phone.compact)">$t(common:contact.phone.formatted)</phoneLink>.

1.question: Is parking free?
1.answer: Yes, parking is free for all our customers. However, please note that the parking lot is very small, please come with only one car for the whole family.

2.question: Can I bring a trailer?
2.answer: Yes, you can come with a trailer as long as it is not larger than 8 feet. Our parking lot is small, please take note of this. Thank you!

3.question: What is the price of the trees?
3.answer: Prices vary depending on the size of the tree. The price is $10 per foot. Please note that we only sell trees between 4 and 8 feet, so a minimum of $40 for the smallest trees.

4.question: Can I bring my dog?
4.answer: No, animals are not allowed on the site for safety and management reasons. Please leave your pets at home.

5.question: What payment methods are accepted?
5.answer: We only accept cash payments. Make sure you have the necessary change for your purchase!

6.question: Where is the farm located?
6.answer: We are located at 2423, 7th rang, Saint-Théodore-d'Acton.
